game.name: IT WATCHES
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Step into the shoes of Subject 35452 in a claustrophobic psychological horror experiment. Navigate a compact testing facility, identify anomalies, and survive the unpredictable environment.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step into the shoes of Subject 35452 in a claustrophobic psychological horror experiment. Navigate a compact testing facility, identify anomalies, and survive the unpredictable environment.
